name: test_e2e_with_logs[343_CMD_OBF_003]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CMD_OBF_003` |
| **Name** | Backslash Bypass Cat |
| **Category** | CMDINJ |
| **Subcategory** | obfuscation |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `;c\at /etc/passwd`
- **Encoded**: `%3Bc%5Cat%20%2Fetc%2Fpasswd`
